content: Click file>new>existing email account. Then enter your name and email address, but omit the password. Follow through the prompts and Google will eventually prompt for your password. If the menu bar isn't shown, click the alt key and then the File option will appear.
creator: davidsk

content: The print menu has a color option for color vs black&white and also has a tickbox for printing backgrounds. I think if you select color and tick to print backgrounds that the color will work. I tested it and it works for me.
creator: davidsk

content: Yes but then someone else can just open it again, I want to log out completely and only log in with my password to avoid other people reading my emails.
creator: joparsons26

content: You can set a primary password at settings>privacy&security. You must remember it, as there is no way to recover it if lost. The feature isn't perfect, as others could still read messages already downloaded, but there is a bug already filed to correct that. The only real safe way is to set up private accounts in Windows (if you use Windows).
creator: davidsk

content: Sorun e-posta sunucunuzdan kaynaklanıyor. E-posta hizmeti aldığınız firmaya danışmanızı öneririm.
creator: maxcoder

content: The easiest approach is the import-export NG addon. highlight the highest level (e.g, Local Folders), rightclick and select one of the export options.
creator: davidsk

content: Non hai fornito praticamente nessuna informazione sulla tua configurazione, per cui posso solo fare ipotesi. Probabilmente usi IMAP come protocollo ed accesi alla tua casella email anche da altri dispositivi. Da uno di questi hai cestinato i messaggi e Thunderbird ha semplicemente sincronizzato il proprio archivio.
creator: @next

content: - click the 'new message' button - if menu bar does not show, press alt key - from menu bar, click view>toolbars and tick 'composition toolbar' to restore the 'send' button.
creator: davidsk

content: Direttamente no. Se l'app Mail di Windows esporta le email in formato eml, o in archivi mbox, questi possono essere importarti facilmente in Thunderbird. Ma non usando Mail non saprei dirti.
creator: @next
